# Usage

Auto generated client SDK for the comments endpoint.
Generated using [Hey API](https://heyapi.dev/). Docs generated
with ts-docs,

* [Repository](https://codeberg.org/bovine/comments)
* [Documentation](https://bovine.codeberg.page/comments/@jsdocs)

## Configuring the client

```js
import { client } from "@cattle-grid/comments-api/client";

client.setConfig({
  baseUrl: "https://comments.bovine.social",
});
```

## Fetching comments

```js
const result = await comments({
  path: {
    path: "base64-encoded-path==",
  },
});
console.log(result.data);
```
